Babel

The Babel formatter is available in templates as bfmt.

See:

  • Date formatting
    • http://babel.edgewall.org/wiki/Documentation/0.9/dates.html
    • http://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Date_Format_Patterns

Sample:

{{bfmt.date(evt.date_from, format="d. MMM y")}}
